ygData.subject: Re: shining star of light
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone is interested, http://everquest.gamestats.com/ has an absolutely incredible quest section, and the shining star of light quest is detailed under the
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone is interested, http://everquest.gamestats.com/ has an
absolutely incredible quest section, and the shining star of light
quest is detailed under the Qeynos section. And while the quest
itself does sound relatively easy, it involves a fair bit of travel
and work. So if anyone is interested in doing this quest, and don't
care about spoilers, check this out. It's liable to save you a lot
of time.


>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>yeah i believe it's tradeable...just a lore item i believe
>
>Curtis Bennett wrote:
>
> > From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>

> > character in Qeynos, trying to get the shing star and then running
> > to Freeport to give it to my main character? Is this possible at all?
